name: Movie Date ["DEMO"""""]
description:
Hello!!! This is my very first game, done for Nanoreno 2022!! It's very unpolished and rushed, but playable! 

I did not have time to complete the GUI/Art/All kinds of other stuff (probably) during the month we had for the jam and know I will be unable to until April, so please stay tuned while I work after the jam to finish her up :)!!

Thank you so much, lovelies!
